description: Journal articles and conference articles, including original research and reviews of existing research
A single chapter within a book, sometimes containing original research
Records with information about one or more database records or collections
Articles whose primary version is one that precedes publication in a peer-reviewed journal or conference, or is hosted in a preprint repository
Documents submitted by someone in completion of an academic degree or professional qualification
Scholarly books including reference books and monographs
A journal article that is a review work
Front-covers, back-covers, tables of contents, and other related records.
Libguides
Letters to the editors at journals, and other types of letters
Works from Crossref marked with type "other"
Entries within reference materials, such as encyclopedias and dictionaries
Technical reports and working papers
Short works written by the editors of journals or other publications
Reviews, reports, or comments about another work
Corrections of existing works
Standards developed by Standards Development Organizations (SDOs) or consortia
Works associated with research grants, which provide funding to support research
Works that have been retracted
Supplementary materials, figures, etc to journal articles
